
requested info: m,P,r,rho of representative Jup and Sat models, sent 23-01-19 to BM:

columns in files mprtd_...: mass (ME), P(GPa), r(RE), T(K), rho(g/cc), other stuff

# Jupiter

A: CMS19, 4L, T1=166.1 K, adg, P12_He=2 Mbar, P23_Z=20 Mbar, gaussian-Z3, rock core, K18 dyn corr on J2,J4 
C: CMS19, 4L, T1=166.1 K, ad,  P12_He=2 Mbar, P23_Z=10 Mbar, constant-Z3, rock core
both: Y_atm=0.238, Y_mean=0.270

# Saturn

A: CMS19, 4L, T1=135 K, modified adiabat, Req=60330 km at 0.1 bar, Y_atm=0.14, P12_He=3 Mbar,  P23_Z=4 Mbar, dilute core Z=0.6  

cite: Nettelmann, Movshovitz, Ni et al 2021 PSJ 2:241
